speaker.whotheyare: BCG's Johanna Benesty is a managing director and partner in the firm's Paris office.
speaker.whylisten: Johanna Benesty is a core member of BCG’s social impact and health care practices for global health, and specializes in digital and analytics for biopharma clients. She has supported the World Health Organization; Unitaid, the Global Fund to Fight AIDs, Tuberculosis and Malaria; and, most recently, the ACT-Accelerator working to accelerate equitable access to COVID-19 fighting tools. She has also worked with private and public health facilities focusing on HIV and tuberculosis in Africa.
